document.full_text: douglas h. shulman, the commissioner of the internal revenue service, apologized to three identity theft victims who said they were treated rudely by i.r.s. employees.
document.title: washington: from the i.r.s., a rare return: an apology
lines_and_colors: douglas h. shulman, the commissioner of the internal revenue service, apologized to three identity theft victims who said they were treated rudely by i.r.s. employees.
